website_summaries.verdict: A portable generator that offers an impressive 7,000 starting watts and 5,500 running watts.
pros: This relatively quiet generator can run for up to 6 hours on a full load and up to 18 hours on a 1/4 load
The Oil Alert system helps protect the engine while the iMonitor displays on-board diagnostics
cons: The backup recoil start is difficult and doesn't offer a smooth pull

customer_reviews.title: Generator arrived broken and Honda can't figure out what is wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately Honda's quality control/assurance program failed to detect that this very expensive generator I received was broken out of the box. After I received it, unpacked it, installed the battery, and put oil and fuel in, it wouldn't start with the electric starter. We managed to get it to work with the pull start, but the electric start was broken. After several phone calls, I was told to take it to an authorized Honda repair dealer. I did that. That was over 3 weeks ago and they can't fix it! They don't know what the problem is. Unbelievable. So, I spend $4K and I have a big paperweight. Not a good situation for me or for Honda.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fichten

customer_reviews.title: Hardtoplease
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! Dry camping with no problems. Just need gas and fill once a day. Air conditioning, full size fridge, lights,microwave etc. Quiet! No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Persnicketty Lady

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding generator!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to power our toy hauler RV when we go camping. We seldom camp where there is electricity and this generator doesn't disappoint. Even when running the air conditioner, fridge and hot water heater it never ran above the lower idle setting. I am impressed that it ran all this for almost 10 hours on 5 gallons of fuel and it is super quiet. This generator is well worth the money and I have no regrets. I also purchased a 35 gallon fuel tank and a long run kit so I don't need to refuel all weekend long.
customer_reviews.author: Duder

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Its great in so many ways. This is so quiet that when its on 2 people can talk without raising voices. Fuel injection, electric start, and the ability to combined 2 of these together for double the output. Fantastic machine. Although it costs more, I feel its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, floating neutral
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how quiet this generator is! It does have a floating neutral, so be aware of this. The power output is extremely stable, will used this as a back up/back up generator for a data facility during maintenance of a much larger primary generator.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bilik

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery to Texas and in perfect condition. I sent it to family in Puerto ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery to Texas and in perfect condition. I sent it to family in Puerto Rico and it works great! Very quiet, not disturbing neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Johaluis

customer_reviews.title: Great Generator
customer_reviews.text: This is a great generator for home backup use. The GX commercial overhead valve engine with injector fueling is perfect. The noise level is amazing low, and the engine can low at lower speeds due to the invertor powering. Yes, this generator is much higher priced than others with the same power, but the quality, low fuel usage, and low noise level make is probably the last generator anyone would need for backup power. This is my second Honda generator, added to my 3000i model, is all that I need for backup use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Y

customer_reviews.title: Like a dream come true
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, powerful, auto choke auto idle, hour meter, fuel gauge, electronic ignition, fuel injection. Honda thought of everything on this one - I love it ! . It's EXPENSIVE, but I feel it's well worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Belal B. Alkadimi

customer_reviews.title: Eficiency at its best.
customer_reviews.text: Best generator on the market, super quiet and very little fuel consumption, maintenance is as easy as cold be. Best investement I could have ever made considering its cost compared to same generator in other places.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet inverter generator, very well built.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, very well built! Standing *next* to this running even with the quieter ECO mode off is still quieter than neighbors across the street down 1-2 houses running their standard 6500watt generator.
customer_reviews.author: CinemaMurph

customer_reviews.title: Great for food trucks, you can hear your customers!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s the Cadillac of quiet inverter generators. Awesome for our food truck so we can actually hear our customers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson, CEO and Principal Consultant

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money, it’s worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, and relatively light. Plenty of power to run a few refrigerators, a microwave, and lights when PG&E shuts down the power.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Edes

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Quiet powerful and it is a Honda Fuel infection and electric start work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely, the best choice for RV owners with 30a service.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive option, but I live in Florida and this will serve dual duty. (1) As a portable generator, it will, simultaneously, power EVERYTHING on my 28' Airstream without "breaking a sweat". Of course, being fuel injected and exceptionally quiet are, also, significant advantages. (2) Recently, hurricane Irma knocked me out of AC power for a couple of days. Next time, I plan to be ready. If frugal choices, this generator should run most of the electrical devices in my home. Although, perhaps, NOT including my central air conditioning system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reed

customer_reviews.title: Built to last. Made just like there cars. I live off the grid and I need some thing I can count on.
customer_reviews.text: MAX TOOL GUY was helpful and fun to talk to on the phone. They sell Honda and other name brands. The Eu7000is is grate
customer_reviews.author: charles l.

customer_reviews.title: Generator was shipped and delivered on time. Honda EU ...
customer_reviews.text: Generator was shipped and delivered on time. Honda EU 7000is is all that I expected it to be, upon arrival I followed instructions and generator started immediately and passed all voltage and amp tests. Thank you Honda!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Efficient. Plenty of power to run all the essentials for your home during a power outage. Water pump, sump pump, lift pump for septic, and furnace fan with plenty left over for lights, tv and computer. Self adjusts to the load and the voltage stays constant. Econo Mode for saving fuel. Everything in a neat small footprint so it stores almost anywhere. If you want quality, here it is.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Love

customer_reviews.title: As advertised (a nice treat), fast delivery, well packaged. Exactly what I love in any transaction.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, well packaged, with no signs of damage to the package or generator. Warnings and instructions are all quite good. Was up and running in about 15 minutes. Started in about 2 seconds with press of button. Bloody heavy, but I knew that in advance. This seller was up front with what they were selling whereas some OTHER generator sellers with ONLY Honda engines sell their generators as "Honda Generators". Read between the lines.
customer_reviews.author: D. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: No words to describe the relief of this purchase. ...
customer_reviews.text: No words to describe the relief of this purchase. My grandma has power for more than 300 days her house. After Hurricane Maria stroke my island. Thank you seller. And high quality!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Chinea

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet operation. I wish I had this one when Hurricane Irma came through. The one I had I bought 20 years ago that I used for Hurricane Irma was noisy and used a lot of fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is quite and works to run our 50 amp concession trailer with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best generator I have seen and not heard! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No one can hear it running!
customer_reviews.text: This generator has been there for us during many an outage. It so quiet that no one can hear it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Abril

customer_reviews.title: Bought a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new about a year ago. The generator no longer runs, it starts for a few seconds then stalls. It has been in an authorized Honda repair shop for warranty work for 7 weeks as of the date of this review. Honda keeps sending new parts to the shop and can not figure out the issue. Honda customer service has stopped responding to my emails and repeated requests to replace the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this generator why not just get a Generac stand alone hooked right up to your home.
customer_reviews.author: John Young

customer_reviews.title: Best 7000 watt generator on the market !
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased from my local dealer. Needed a generator that had 240v so I can run my well pump! This will do that plus my full size fridge, lighting and appliance as needed. Have a manual transfer box so it will be controlled by me at the breaker box. Could not ask for cleaner power that this 7K inverter. It is so quiet, you can hardly hear it running rom inside the house. Being a Honda, it will last for year and year with proper maint.
customer_reviews.author: Greg in Jax FL

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely purchase another if I had the need..
customer_reviews.text: To make a long story short, I could not be happier with the performance, efficiency, and the absolute quietness of this unit. A little pricey, but with this unit you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: DaUglyman

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the day before Matthew struck, we have been without city power for 40 hours+ And the generator has only used 15 gallons of gas. Super quiet, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT weigh 50 lbs....!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: More like 262 lbs. That's off by 200 # Amazon. Great generator, but heavy as hell and not good for camping unless its permanently installed on your truck or rig. Good for work or emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente L. Provencio

customer_reviews.title: The best buy that I make
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. I paid only $295.00 to ship to Puerto Rico by vessel and was delivered by Honda Peak in Colorado. The best buy that I make.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This generator is an excellent unit. Very quiet running and never needs more ...
customer_reviews.text: This generator is an excellent unit. Very quiet running and never needs more than one or two pulls to get fired up. Couldn't ask for a better generator that is so quiet. In fact this unit is only a slight bit noiser than the EU2000.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hurt

product_meta.title: Honda EU7000iAT1 7000 Watt 120/240 Volt Super Quiet Portable Electric Generator
product_meta.description: Whether you're looking to add an extra refrigerator at home, a larger saw on your construction site, or want to have a larger TV at your tailgate party, the Honda EU7000iAT1 Super Quiet Electric Powered Generator. The EU7000iAT1 is powered by an exceptionally quiet, smooth, fuel-efficient, 7000-watt motor in a small, lightweight package. Smart electronic fuel injection technology increases fuel efficiency, eliminates the engine choke, and reduces fuel associated carburetor problems. The Eco-Throttle System runs 6-18 hours on a single tank, so overnight power is no problem for this generator. Your neighbors will also love your portable generator that operates at 52 - 58 decibels, which is less noise than a normal conversation. Honda's automatic mechanical decompressor system also significantly reduces the amount of force needed to start the engine for easy starting, every time. The “Fuel Off” position allows the engine to continue to run until the majority of the fuel in the carburetor is consumed and the engine shuts off. This helps prevent stale fuel issues and is useful when storing the generator. From camping trips to race tracks, this 7,000 Watt Honda Portable Inverter Electric Generator will provide you power wherever you go.
feature_bullets: 7,000-watt generator can power countless devices and appliances
Use at home, in RVs, at outdoor events, or while camping
Electronic Fuel Injection technology makes the generator run for longer and function smoothly
Fuel-efficient: a full tank lasts up to 18 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars87 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
